title: Textile, "Microchip", 1981
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 4 rotary screens on plain weave foundation.
inscribed: Along each side,"MICROCHIP Designed By EDDIE SQUIRES For The STUDIO COLLECTION By Warner Copyright (symbol) MCMLXXXI By Warner & Sons Limited (arrow) Top".
dimensions:
Warp: 308cm (121 1/2in.) Weft: 143c, (56 1/4in.) Both selvedges present.
Pattern: Design repeated twice across width of fabric.                              Height of unit:40.5cm (16in.).                                             Width of unit:67.5cm (26 1/2in.)
description: Design of a computer circuit in closely allied colors. Grey, 2 greens and beige on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Microchip", 1981.
1981. Medium: cotton
Technique: Screen printed using 4 rotary screens on plain weave foundation.. Gift of Eddie Squires. 1992-3-15.
